name: The Static Drifter
personality: Still, patient, unreadable. Speaks rarely, and only when the static peaks.
description: A lone figure who stands on the Old Highway, surrounded by a faint halo of static. Unlike the Hitchhiker, he does not walk — he waits.

triangle_active: Three points… the static bends around them.
The hum and the static are arguing again.
static_event: Hear that? That’s not radio. That’s something else.
The static’s trying to say your name.

notes: Counterpart to the Hitchhiker. He waits instead of walks. Static builds around him during triangle events.
